AFMU repairs.name: AFMU repairs
AFMU repairs.description: Triggered when repairing modules using the Auto Field Maintenance Unit (AFMU)

Asteroid cracked.name: Asteroid cracked
Asteroid cracked.description: Triggered when you break up a 'Motherlode' asteroid for mining

Asteroid prospected.script:
{set minimumPercent to 10} {_ The minimum percentage surface mineral concentration to report _}
{set spokenCores to [
    "Alexandrite": false,
    "Benitoite": false,
    "Grandidierite": false,
    "Low Temperature Diamonds": true,
    "Monazite": false,
    "Musgravite": false,
    "Rhodplumsite": false,
    "Serendibite": false,
    "Void Opals": true,
]}
{set spokenMinerals to [
    "Bauxite": false,
    "Bertrandite": false,
    "Bromellite": false,
    "Cobalt": false,
    "Coltan": false,
    "Cryolite": false,
    "Gallite": false,
    "Gold": false,
    "Goslarite": false,
    "Hydrogen Peroxide": false,
    "Indite": false,
    "Jadeite": false,
    "Lepidolite": false,
    "Lithium Hydroxide": false,
    "Liquid oxygen": false,
    "Low Temperature Diamonds": true,
    "Methane Clathrate": false,
    "Methanol Monohydrate": false,
    "Moissanite": false,
    "Osmium": false,
    "Painite": true,
    "Platinum": false,
    "Palladium": false,
    "Praseodymium": false,
    "Pyrophyllite": false,
    "Rutile": false,
    "Samarium": false,
    "Silver": false,
    "Taaffeite": false,
    "Thorium": false,
    "Tritium": true,
    "Uraninite": false,
    "Water": false,
]}

{if len(event.motherlode) > 0 && spokenCores[event.motherlode]:
   Motherlode detected: {event.motherlode}.
}

{set minerals to []}
{for mineral in event.commodities:
    {if mineral.percentage > minimumPercent && spokenMinerals[mineral.commodity]:
        {set mineral_desc to: 
            {round(mineral.percentage)} percent {mineral.commodity}
        }
        {set minerals to cat(minerals, [mineral_desc])}
    }
}
{if len(minerals) > 0:
    Asteroid contains {List(minerals)}
    {if event.materialcontent = "High":
        and a high concentration of engineering materials
    }.
    {if event.remaining < 100:
        It is {100 - event.remaining} percent depleted.
    }
}
Asteroid prospected.name: Asteroid prospected
Asteroid prospected.description: Triggered when using a prospecting drone

Commander promotion.script:
{_ Context }
{SetState('eddi_context_last_subject', 'rank')}
{SetState('eddi_context_last_action', 'promotion')}
{SetState('eddi_context_rank_name', lower(event.rank_type))}
{SetState('eddi_context_rank_amount', event.rating)}

{if event.rank_type = "Combat":
    You have been recognised for your valor as a combat pilot, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "CQC":
    You have been recognised for your valor as a close quarters combat pilot, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Trade":
    You have been recognised for your trading acumen, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Exploration":
    You have been recognised for your work as an explorer, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Federation":
    {set plainHonorific to when(cmdr.gender = 'Female', 'Madam', 'Sir')}
    Congratulations {OneOf('Commander {CommanderName()}', plainHonorific)}! You have
    {OneOf('achieved', 'been promoted to', 'been granted')}
    the rank of {event.rank}
    {Occasionally(2, OneOf('within the Federal Navy', 'for your service to the Federation'))}.
    {if event.rating = 3:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Dropship.
    |elif event.rating = 4:
        This grants you access to the {P('Sol', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 5:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Assault Ship, and have access to the {P('Vega', 'starsystem')} and {P('Beta Hydri', 'starsystem')} systems.
    |elif event.rating = 6:
        This grants you access to the {P('PLX 695', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 7:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Gunship, and have access to the {P('Ross 128', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 8:
        This grants you access to the {P('Exbeur', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 10:
        This grants you access to the {P('Hors', 'starsystem')} system.
    |elif event.rating = 12:
        You now qualify to purchase the Federal Corvette.
    |elif event.rating = 14:
        This is the highest rank available to a member of the Federal Naval Reserve.
    }   
|elif event.rank_type = "Empire":
    Congratulations {F("Empire honorific")},
    the Imperial Navy has 
    {OneOf("granted you a promotion", "promoted you", "advanced you", "named you")}
    to the rank of {event.rank}
    {Occasionally(2, OneOf("within the Imperial Navy", "for your service to the Empire"))}.
    {if event.rating = 1:
        You may now purchase the Imperial Eagle.
    |elif event.rating = 3:
        You may now purchase the Imperial Courier.
    |elif event.rating = 4:
        This grants you the honour of entering the {P("Achenar", "starsystem")} system.
    |elif event.rating = 7:
        This allows you to purchase the Imperial Clipper, and the honour of entering the {P("Summerland", "starsystem")} system.
    |elif event.rating = 10:
        This grants you the honour of entering the {P("Facece", "starsystem")} system
    |elif event.rating = 12:
        You may now purchase the Imperial Cutter.
    |elif event.rating = 14:
        This is the highest {OneOf("rank", "honor")} available to a member of the Imperial Naval Reserve.
    }
|elif event.rank_type = "Mercenary":
    You have been recognised for your skills as a mercenary, {F("Honorific")}.
|elif event.rank_type = "Exobiologist":
    You have been recognised for your work as an exobiologist, {F("Honorific")}.
}

Docking denied.script:
{Pause(2000)}

Nous avons un refus d'appontage

{if event.reason = "ActiveFighter":
     Car nos armes sont déployées
|elif event.reason = "Distance":
     Parce que nous sommes trop loin de la station
|elif event.reason = "Hostile":
     Parce que la sation est sous le contôle d'une faction qui ne veut pas de nous
|elif event.reason = "NoSpace":
     Parce que tous les pads d'atterrissage sont occupés
|elif event.reason = "Offences":
     Parce que nous avons récemment commis un crime contre eux!... non? sans blague?
|elif event.reason = "TooLarge":
     Parce qu'il n'y a aucune zone d'atterrissage assez grande pour notre vaisseau
}.

Honorific.script:
{if system.allegiance = "Empire":
    {if cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 4:
       commandeur
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 5:
        sieur
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank <= 11:
        monseigneur
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 12:
        votre grace
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 13:
        votre altesse royale
    |elif cmdr.empirerating.rank = 14:
        votre majesté
    }
|elif system.allegiance = "Federation":
    {if cmdr.federationrating.rank = 0:
        commandeur
    |else:
        {cmdr.federationrating.name}
    }
|else:
    commandeur
}
Honorific.name: Honorific
Honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander

Hull damaged.script:
{if event.vehicle = vehicle:
    {if event.health < 40:
        Danger!:
    |elif event.health < 60:
        Attention!:
    |elif event.health < 80:
        Alerte!:
    }
    {OneOf("Coque", "Intégrité structurelle", "Intégrité")} {Occasionally(3, "est")} à {event.health}%.
}
Hull damaged.name: Hull damaged
Hull damaged.description: Triggered when your hull is damaged to a certain extent

Insurance check.script:
{set insurance to round(ship.value * cmdr.insurance / 100)}

{set covereds to round((cmdr.credits / insurance) - 0.5)}

{if covereds = 0:
  Danger: vous ne pouvez pas payer d'assurance actuellement.
|elif covereds = 1:
  Attention: Vous avez juste assez de crédit pour payer votre assurance une seule fois.
|elif covereds < 4:
  Note: Vous pouvez payer votre assurance huste deux ou trois fos.
|else
  (aucun problème dassurance avec ce compte en banque)
}
Insurance check.name: Insurance check
Insurance check.description: Check for enough credits to cover your insurance

Jet cone boost.description: Triggered when enough material has been collected from a solar jet cone (at a white dwarf or neutron star) for a jump boost

Jet cone damage.description: Triggered in normal space when passing through the jet cone from a white dwarf or neutron star causes damage to a ship module

Jumped.name: Jumped
Jumped.description: Triggered when you complete a jump to another system

Killed.name: Killed
Killed.description: Triggered when you kill another player

Landing gear.name: Landing gear
Landing gear.description: Triggered when you deploy or retract your landing gear

Landing pad report.script:
{set landingpad to state.eddi_context_landing_pad_pad}
Votre plate forme dattérissage numéro {landingpad} est 
{if landingpad = 1:
    à proximité à six heure
|elif landingpad = 2:
    proche de lentré à six heures
|elif landingpad = 3:
    à 6 heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 4:
    à 6 heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 5:
   vers les sept heures proche 
|elif landingpad = 6:
    à sept heure juste à cotés
|elif landingpad = 7:
    à sept heure vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 8:
    vers les sept heures en séloignant
|elif landingpad = 9:
    à huit heure juste devant
|elif landingpad = 10:
    à huit heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 11:
    à neuf heure proche
|elif landingpad = 12:
    vers les neufs juste aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 13:
    vers les neufs heures, au centre de la station
|elif landingpad = 14:
    à neuf heures, au fond de la station
|elif landingpad = 15:
    à meuf heures, vers l'arrière de la station
|elif landingpad = 16:
    juste en entrant à dix heures
|elif landingpad = 17:
    à dix heures, juste aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 18:
    vers les dix heures, dans le cul de basse fosse
|elif landingpad = 19:
    Vers les dix heures, au fond de la station
|elif landingpad = 20:
    à onze heures proche de l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 21:
    juste aprés l'entrée à onze heures
|elif landingpad = 22:
    vers les onze heures dans les profondeurs de la station
|elif landingpad = 23:
    au fond à onze heures
|elif landingpad = 24:
    à douze heures vers l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 25:
    à douze heure au fond
|elif landingpad = 26:
    à une heure, juste aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 27:
    à une heure, proche de l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 28:
    à une heure vers le milieu de la station
|elif landingpad = 29:
    à une heure vraiment loin de l'entrée
|elif landigpad = 30:
    vers les une heure au fond de la station
|elif landingpad = 31:
    à deux heures, au début de la station
|elif landingpad = 32:
    à deux heures en entrant
|elif landingpad = 33:
    à deux heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 34:
    à deux heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 35:
 à trois heures, au début de la station
|elif landingpad = 36:
    à trois heures juste à l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 37:
    à trois heures, vers le centre de la station
|elif landingpad = 38:
    à trois heures vers le fond
|elif landingpad = 39:
    à quatres heures juste en entrant
|elif landingpad = 40:
    à quatres heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 41:
    à cinq heures peu aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 42:
    à cinq heures peu aprés l'entrée
|elif landingpad = 43:
    à cinq heures vers le centre de la station
|elif landingpad = 44:
 à cinq heures au fond
|elif landingpad = 45:
 à cinq heures au fond de la station
}
 , en passant correctement avec les lumières vertes à votre droite.

Material threshold.script:
{if event.level = 'Minimum':
    {_ Gone below the minimum level }
    {OneOf("Stock", "Inventaire", "Approvisionnement")} de {event.material.name} est passé en dessous de votre minimum surveillé.
|elif event.level = 'Maximum':
  {_ Gone above the maximum level }
    {OneOf("Stock", "Inventaire", "Approvisionnement")} of {event.material.name} a augmenté au delà de votre maximum toléré.
|else:
    {_ Moved around the desired level }
    {if event.change = 'Increase':
 Vous avez atteint la quantité optimale désirée de : {event.material.name}.
    |else:
        Vous êtes en dessous de la quantité nominale désirée pour : {event.material.name}.
    }
} 

{OneOf("Le stock actuel est de {event.amount}",
       "inventaire de {event.amount}",
       "{event.amount} unités à bord")}.

Power preparation vote cast.script:
Votre vote d'une valeur de {if event.amount=1: une |else: {event.amount}} voix 
{OneOf("envoyé à", "enregistré pour")} {event.power} est placé sur le systême {event.system}.

Powerplay.script:
You are pledged to {P(event.power)}. 
You have served for 
{if event.timepledgedweeks > 1:
    {Humanise(event.timepledgedweeks)} weeks 
|elif event.timepledgedweeks = 1:
    one week 
|elif event.timepledgeddays > 1:
    {Humanise(event.timepledgeddays)} days
|elif event.timepledgeddays = 1:
    one day
|else:
    less than one day
}
and are at rank {event.rank} with 
{if event.merits > 0:
    {Humanise(event.merits)}
|else:
    no
}
accumulated merits.

Powerplay.description: Triggered periodically when pledged to a power

Pour la somme de {event.price} crédits.

Shutdown.name: Shutdown
Shutdown.description: Triggered on a clean shutdown of the game

Signal detected.script:
{_ Edit the true/false values of `spokenSources` to identify signal types that should be announced whenever they are first detected within a system (otherwise, only signal sources detected while in fss or saa mode will be taken into account. _}

{set spokenSources to [
    "Anomaly": true,
    "AX Conflict Zone": true,
    "Capitol Ship": false,
    "Ceremonial Comms": false,
    "Combat Aftermath": false,
    "Compromised Nav Beacon": false,
    "Convoy Dispersal Pattern Detected": false,
    "Degraded Emissions": false,
    "Distress Call": true,
    "Encoded Emissions": false,
    "Hazardous Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "High Grade Emissions": false,
    "High Intensity Combat Zone": false,
    "High Intensity Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Listening Post": true,
    "Low Intensity Combat Zone": false,
    "Low Intensity Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Medium Intensity Combat Zone": false,
    "Mission Target": true,
    "Nav Beacon": false,
    "Non-Human Signal Source": false,
    "Notable Stellar Phenomena": true,
    "Resource Extraction Site": false,
    "Trading Beacon": false,
    "Unidentified Signal Source": false,
    "Unregistered Comms Beacon": true,
    "Weapons Fire": false,
]}

{if status.gui_focus = "fss mode" || status.gui_focus = "saa mode" || 
(spokenSources[event.source] = true && event.unique):
    {if event.source && !event.stationsignal:
        {if event.threatlevel > 0:
            Class {event.threatlevel} 
        }
        {event.source} 
        {if event.faction != "None":
            for {event.faction}
        }
        detected.
    }
}
Signal detected.name: Signal detected
Signal detected.description: Triggered when a signal source is detected

Silent running.name: Silent running
Silent running.description: Triggered when you activate or deactivate silent running

Squadron rank.name: Squadron rank
Squadron rank.description: Triggered when your rank with a squadron has changed

Squadron status.script:
{_ Squadron status }
{_ Triggered when your status with a squadron changes }


{if event.status = "applied":
    You have applied for admission into the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "created":
    You have created the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "disbanded":
    The {event.name} squadron has been disbanded.
|elif event.status = "invited":
    You have been invited into the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "joined":
    You have joined the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "kicked":
    You have been kicked from the {event.name} squadron.
|elif event.status = "left":
    You have left the {event.name} squadron.
}
Squadron status.name: Squadron status
Squadron status.description: Triggered when your status with a squadron has changed

Station no fire zone entered.script:
{if event.weaponsdeployed = "true" :
 Attention: Vous entrez dans une zone neutre avec vos armes déployées. 
 Désactivez les avant représaille de la station.
|else :
 Vous entrez dans une zone neutre. N'activez vos armes que si vous en acceptez les risques.

}

Station no fire zone exited.script: Vous sortez d'une zone neutre. {Occasionally(5, "Assurez vous de n'être pas suivi ou attendu par vos ennemis.")}
